# <a name="how-do-i-turn-off-skype-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="b40e1-102">Kako izklopiti Skype v Outlook.com?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b40e1-102">How do I turn off Skype in Outlook.com?</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b40e1-103">Ne morete odstraniti Skype Outlook.com, vendar lahko onemogočite obvestila:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b40e1-103">You can't remove Skype from Outlook.com, but you can disable notifications:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="b40e1-104">Odprta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b40e1-104">Open</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="b40e1-105">**Nastavitve** > **splošnih** > **[obvestila](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/notifications)**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b40e1-105">**Settings** > **General** > **[Notifications](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/notifications)**.</span></span> 
2. <span data-ttu-id="b40e1-106">Pod **klepet in klic**, onesposobiti oznanilo vrste ne želite več.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b40e1-106">Under **Chat and call**, disable the notification types you no longer want.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b40e1-107">Če želite več informacij o uporabi Skype, preberite [pogovor z družino in prijatelji na Skype v Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/83c6a5b1-3921-479c-b9e9-e753ce59c1fa?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b40e1-107">For more information on using Skype, read [Talk to family and friends on Skype in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/83c6a5b1-3921-479c-b9e9-e753ce59c1fa?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
